tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_feedback_and_reviews (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    application_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    app_name VARCHAR(255),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE app_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserFeedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  app_id UUID,
  rating INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE AppReview (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE AppReviews (
    reviewID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appID INT,
    userID INT,
    review TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE app_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE app_details (
  app_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  developer VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE user_details (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE app_ratings (
  app_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  total_ratings INT,
  average_rating FLOAT
)
